articles.title: Negative Coronavirus Report Must For Those Entering Gujarat - NDTV
articles.description: The Gujarat government on Saturday announced that a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR test report will be mandatory for those arriving from other states.
articles.content:
The order will come into force from April 1. (FILE)
Ahmedabad: The Gujarat government on Saturday announced that a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR test report will be mandatory for those arriving from othe… [+895 chars]
